mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOCAL (local_name, local_hello, local_lat, local_lng, local_loc, local_tel, local_pic) VALUES (#{local_name}, #{local_hello}, #{local_lat}, #{local_lng}, #{local_loc}, #{local_tel}, #{local_pic});
mapper.select: SELECT local_uid, local_name, local_hello, local_lat, local_lng, local_loc, IFNULL(case left(local_tel,2) when '02' then case char_length(local_tel) when '10' then concat('02','-',substring(local_tel,3,4),'-',right(local_tel,4)) when '11' then concat('02','-',substring(local_tel,3,3),'-',right(local_tel,4)) end else case char_length(local_tel) when '10' then concat(left(local_tel,3),'-',substring(local_tel,4,3),'-',right(local_tel,4)) when '11' then concat(left(local_tel,3),'-',substring(local_tel,4,4),'-',right(local_tel,4)) when '8' then concat(left(local_tel,4),'-',substring(local_tel,4,4)) end end,'미등록') as 'local_tel', local_pic FROM LOCAL WHERE local_uid = #{local_uid};
mapper.update: UPDATE LOCAL SET local_hello = #{a.local_hello}, local_pic = #{a.local_pic} WHERE local_uid = #{param1};
